Key Arguments: The legislation is against the principles fought for in past World Wars.
The bill is likened to actions of a Communist country, implying it restricts freedom.
Australians should have the freedom to access and interpret information themselves, regardless of its truthfulness.
The bill is seen as a form of censorship and bullying.
Notable Quotes: How dare you try and stop people having their say and opinions on line.
THIS IS AUSTRALIA. OUR LAND THATS ONE AND FREE!
WE ALL HAVE A FREE MIND TO TAKE WHAT INFORMATION IS OUT THERE WHETHER IT BE MISINFORMATION OR NOT AND DECIDE FOR OURSELVES WHATS THE TRUTH OR WHATS NOT THE TRUTH IS.
